title: Nezumi Monogatari: George to Gerald no Bouken
synopsis: Nezumi Monogatari is the story of two mice called George and Gerald who embark on a journey together with three friends to find the "Dragon of Light".
voices: ['Kikuchi, Mika', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Hayashibara, Megumi', 'Nozawa, Masako', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Inuyama, Inuko', 'Utsumi, Kenji']
staff: [['Hata, Masami', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Mima, Masafumi', ['Sound Director']], ['Hirata, Toshio', ['Character Design']], ['Kurahashi, Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']]]
